attributes.action: Peter Brock must resign IMMEDIATELY from Yeovil Town Council
attributes.additional_details:
In March, Yeovil town councillor Peter Brock was found guilty of three counts of theft from The Royal British Legion amounting to more than £1,200. A further 20 offences were taken into consideration.

We think it is absolutely disgusting and a public outrage that this man continues to represent the people of Yeovil, and should resign immediately.
